pages.text: Has a 2% chance to spawn from a $(l:saber/mobs/shimi)Shimi$(/l)

Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Saber (2020, TV show)$(br2)Health: 100$(br2)Special moves:$(li)Evolves into $(l:saber/mobs/legeiel_forbidden)Legeiel Forbidden$(/l) when killed while you have the $(l:saber/items/wonder_ride_books#primitive_dragon_wonder_ride_book)Primitive Dragon Wonder Ride Book$(/l) in your inventory$(br2)Drops$(li)4-6 $(l:saber/items/blank_wonder_ride_book)Blank Wonder Ride Books$(/l)$(li)1 $(l:saber/items/blank_wonder_world_story_wonder_ride_book)Blank Wonder World Story Wonder Ride Book$(/l)
